docs.text: Predicting the spread of COVID-19 ¶ We developed a novel probabilistic model to estimate the spread of COVID-19. Info This web is still work in progress. We will update the web with recent information soon. How it works ¶ We curated the model using the most recent publications describing the dynamics of the SARS-CoV-2 virus and we created a simulator that generates trajectories of possible scenarios in a realistic way, based on the assumptions of how the virus spreads. Using data from the observed fatalities, we trained our model to find the most probable configuration that leads, on average, to the observed number of fatalities.
docs.title: Home

Using data from the observed fatalities, we trained our model to find the most probable configuration that leads, on average, to the observed number of fatalities.

docs.text: Other countries ¶ We are working to produce accurate models for different countries var ccaa = ['Galicia', 'Madrid'] Plotly.d3.csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datadista/datasets/master/COVID%2019/ccaa_covid19_fallecidos_long.csv', (err, rows) => { var data = ccaa.map(y => { var d = rows.filter(r => r.CCAA === y) return { type: 'bar', name: y, x: d.map(r => r.fecha), y: d.map(r => r.total) } }) console.log(data) Plotly.newPlot('div-plot', data) })
docs.title: Other countries

docs.text: We are working to produce accurate models for different countries var ccaa = ['Galicia', 'Madrid'] Plotly.d3.csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datadista/datasets/master/COVID%2019/ccaa_covid19_fallecidos_long.csv', (err, rows) => { var data = ccaa.map(y => { var d = rows.filter(r => r.CCAA === y) return { type: 'bar', name: y, x: d.map(r => r.fecha), y: d.map(r => r.total) } }) console.log(data) Plotly.newPlot('div-plot', data) })
docs.title: Other countries

docs.text: Castilla y León ¶ Total deaths ¶ Plotly.d3.json('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/covid19-modeling/forecasts/master/results/latest/ES-CL_total-deaths.json', function(err, fig) { Plotly.newPlot('div-plot-deaths', fig.data, fig.layout); }); Total infected ¶ Plotly.d3.json('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/covid19-modeling/forecasts/master/results/latest/ES-CL_percentage-total-infected.json', function(err, fig) { Plotly.newPlot('div-plot-infections', fig.data, fig.layout); });
docs.title: Castilla y León
